description:
The desire to beat http://anidb.net/ch107287 [Shinozaki] has brought http://anidb.net/ch107285 [Maeshima] and http://anidb.net/ch107286 [Sasugai] to the Grand Prix finals. Shinozaki and their other rivals watch as Ionodai High School skates their final program to try and beat the champions, St. Clavis Gakuin.
Source: Funimation
